name: Airborne Pathogen Defense
description: Techniques and strategies to prevent, detect, and neutralize airborne biological threats.

cards.title: Respiratory Protection Against Airborne Threats
cards.description: Understanding and using proper respirators and filtration systems to prevent inhalation exposure.
cards.bulletpoints: N95 vs. P100, full-face respirators, SCBA systems

cards.title: Air Filtration and Containment Strategies
cards.description: Utilizing air purification and containment methods to prevent pathogen spread.
cards.bulletpoints: HEPA filtration, UV light sterilization, airlock procedures

cards.title: Rapid Biohazard Detection & Analysis
cards.description: Techniques for identifying airborne biological threats in real time.
cards.bulletpoints: Portable air samplers, biotoxin detection strips, environmental monitoring
